interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has a Glitch (Home Video)
Review Date: 2018/03/04
Store: Dakota Fanning  (Actor),     Chris Sanders  (Actor),     Tony Leondis  (Director),     Michael LaBash  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'The unforgettable story of Stitch and Lilo continues in Disney\'s hilarious all-new movie LILO & STITCH 2. Your favorite characters return in this heartwarming comedy about bringing friends and family together even when they seem worlds apart. Before the other 625 experiments land in Hawaii, Stitch is living the good life. He helps Lilo follow in the footsteps of her mother as she prepares for the big island hula contest, but when Stitch gets a glitch, their perfect world goes haywire. Now it\'s going to take Lilo, Nani, Jumba, and a whole lotta "Ohana" for them to save their funny little friend. With three classic Elvis Presley songs and exclusive bonus material, LILO & STITCH 2 is a whole new wave of fun and excitement for the entire family.', 'Amazon.com', 'Familial love proves all-powerful when Stitch gets a glitch that encourages bad behavior and threatens his relationship with Lilo in', 'Lilo and Stitch 2', '. Like the first', 'Lilo and Stitch', ", this straight-to-DVD sequel focuses primarily on Stitch, Lilo, and Lilo's sister Nani. Stitch's nightmares about misbehaving prove prophetic when he begins experiencing moments of uncontrollable badness. Unfortunately, Stitch's unruly actions always seem to interfere with Lilo's important preparations for the May Day hula competition--a competition that Lilo desperately wants to win in her mother's memory. Jumba goes to work creating a fusion chamber that will re-charge Stitch's molecules and purge his badness, but he can't seem to build one that works. In the end, it's Lilo's faith in herself and the power of Ohana that offer the only chance to cure Stitch and fill his goodness level to the top. (Ages 3-12)", '--Tami Horiuchi', 'Review', '"A funny and entertaining thrill-a-minute adventure for the whole family." --', 'Earl Dittman, Wireless Magazine', '"A sharp, clever and entertaining animated adventure." --', 'Earl Dittman, Wirless Magazine', '"Inspiring for the whole family." --', 'Ed Held, DVD Buz', '"Sure to thrill fans of the original." --', 'Kirk Montgomery, NBC', 'See more']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Animation', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Chris Sanders, Kunewa Mook, David Ogden Stiers, Screenplay By Tony Leondis & Michael LaBash And Al, Tia Carrere, Dakota Fanning, Michael LaBash, Jason Scott Lee, Kevin McDonald, Tony LeondisChris Sanders, Kunewa Mook, David Ogden Stiers, Screenplay By Tony Leondis & Michael LaBash And Al, Tia Carrere, Dakota Fanning, Michael LaBash, Jason Scott Lee, Kevin McDonald, Tony Leondis  See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS 5.1), Czech (DTS 5.1), French, Unqualified, Spanish', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 8 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.3 x 7.6 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '786936240139', 'Director': 'Tony Leondis, Michael LaBash', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 8 minutes', 'Release date': 'August 30, 2005', 'Actors': 'Dakota Fanning, Chris Sanders, Tia Carrere, David Ogden Stiers, Kevin McDonald', 'Subtitles': 'None', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Screenplay By Tony Leondis & Michael LaBash And Al', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: My daughter loves any and all stitch movies
Review Title: Perfect
Rating: 5.0

Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween [DVD]
Tyler Perry  (Actor, Director, Producer),     Cassi Davis  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
['Madea and the gang are back for this hilarious sequel. Madea, Bam and Hattie venture to a haunted campground and the group must literally run for their lives when monsters, goblins and the bogeyman are unleashed.']

Really funny movie
Mile in His Shoes
Dean Cain  (Actor),     Luke Schroder  (Actor),     -  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama
['Only a miracle can help baseball coach Arthur “Murph” Murphy (Dean Cain) and his losing minor league baseball team. As Murph sets out to recruit new talent for the team, he stumbles upon Mickey (Luke Schroder), a young farmer with an incredible pitcher’s arm. However, Mickey’s parents are reluctant to allow him to join the team because he has Asperger’s syndrome, a form of autism. Murph convinces Mickey’s parents that life in the minor league will benefit their unique son, but he doesn’t realize just how much his new recruit will help the team’s game and, more importantly, their spirit. Based on the novel “The Legend 0f Mickey Tussler” by Frank Nappi.']

Such a good and heartfelt movie, everyone needs to watch and get and understanding and clarification on what the autistic children go through
A movie everyone needs to see
Mask
Cher  (Actor),     Eric Stoltz  (Actor),     Peter Bogdanovich  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Fully Loaded DVDs, DTS
['Acclaimed filmmaker Peter Bogdanovich directed this heartwarming and inspirational film based on the real-life story of Rocky Dennis (Eric Stoltz), a terribly disfigured but highly sensitive and intelligent teenager. Motivated by his loving mother, Rusty (Cher), and her boyfriend, Gar (Sam Elliott), Rocky ultimately overcomes pain, loneliness and prejudice to become a role model to his classmates and teachers alike.Bonus Content:', 'Mask Revealed: A Conversation with Director Peter Bogdanovich', 'Mask Revealed: A Conversation with Director Peter Bogdanovich', 'Feature Commentary with Director Peter Bogdanovich', 'Feature Commentary with Director Peter Bogdanovich']

Tyler Perry's The Single Moms Club [DVD + Digital]
Nia Long  (Actor),     Wendi McLendon-Covey  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
['Brought together by an incident at their children’s school, a group of single mothers from different walks of life bond and create a support group that helps them find comedy in the obstacles of life, as well as their inner strength to overcome their personal challenges.']

profile:
The user profile has been further updated to reflect a sustained love for comedy movies, now complemented by a notable admiration for family-friendly animated films that emphasize themes of love and togetherness. Their recent purchase showcases a loyalty to established animated franchises and a desire for content that resonates with familial values, mirroring their interest in films that inspire community and resilience. 

The user continues to favor physical media, particularly DVDs, reinforcing their passion for tangible collections and traditional viewing experiences. Their rating behavior remains consistent, providing high ratings (5.0) for films that connect emotionally and entertain, indicative of a positivity bias that merges entertainment with deeper messages.

While they previously enjoyed sequels, the user's interests are steadily broadening to include a wider array of meaningful storytelling, demonstrating an appreciation for narratives that tackle heartfelt themes. Their enjoyment of humor remains strong, yet there’s a noticeable shift toward films that convey significant, inspirational messages and address social issues, reflecting their evolving taste for authentic and impactful storytelling. Overall, the user actively seeks diverse films, balancing their love for comedy with an increasing appreciation for animated stories that celebrate family bonds and heartfelt connections.
